roadmap.name: Implement Threat Map
roadmap.description: Develop and integrate a threat map to visualize malicious activities across Discord servers.

roadmap.name: Enhance Dashboard Analytics
roadmap.description: Add advanced analytics and reporting features to the dashboard for better threat monitoring.

roadmap.name: Improve Data Collection
roadmap.description: Get more servers to contribute to the project and improve the overall analytics in the Dashboard.

roadmap.name: Add User Reporting System
roadmap.description: Implement a system for users to report compromised accounts and malicious activities.

roadmap.name: Add Status Check Page
roadmap.description: Created a status check page to monitor the project's status and various services in use.

roadmap.name: Add FAQ Page
roadmap.description: Created an FAQ page to answer frequently asked questions.

roadmap.name: Add Info Page
roadmap.description: Detail every part of the site in a dedicated information page.

roadmap.name: Add News Page
roadmap.description: Public news page using an API or RSS Feed to fetch up-to-date news articles.

roadmap.name: Restructure Web App Files
roadmap.description: Refactored the web app structure to separate JavaScript and CSS files for better maintainability.

roadmap.name: Created Social Share Images
roadmap.description: Designed dedicated social media share images for each page on the site.

roadmap.name: Adjust Light & Dark Themes
roadmap.description: Refined light and dark themes for improved formatting and styling.

roadmap.name: Create Resource Center Page
roadmap.description: Develop a resource center page to share information, tools, and reporting methods for users and server owners.

roadmap.name: Fix Mobile UI Issues
roadmap.description: Resolve various UI issues affecting mobile browsers for better usability.

roadmap.name: Adjust Theme for UI Fixes
roadmap.description: Fine-tune the theme to fix elements that do not function as expected.

roadmap.name: Add Intelligence Page
roadmap.description: Created the intelligence page to display aggregated data and insights.

roadmap.name: Add Roadmap Page
roadmap.description: Set up the roadmap page to track development progress.

roadmap.name: Add 404 Page
roadmap.description: Designed and implemented a custom 404 error page.

roadmap.name: Add All Site-Data Files
roadmap.description: Added all necessary site-data files for full PWA implementation and indexing.

roadmap.name: Create Suite of Database Modules
roadmap.description: Developed a suite of modules to validate and process database files.

roadmap.name: Add GitHub Related Pages
roadmap.description: Created dedicated pages on the website for the LICENSE, SECURITY.md, CONTRIBUTING.md and CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
